title: CE41011: Flows In Boundary Layer - Quick Facts
text:
CE41011
Course name | Flows In Boundary Layer
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Inviscid irrotational and viscous fluid flows; fundamental equations of viscous flow; continuity equations of viscous flow; transition to turbulence; NavierStokes equations and their solutions; Couette flows; viscous and turbulent boundary layers; similarity solution for two-dimensional flow; boundary layer approximation; free shear flow; flow stability; concept of small disturbance stability.
